creator: cwitt@bea.com
text:
setPrefix("test:") in ElementNSImpl and AttrNSImpl throw DOMException with code 
NAMESPACE_ERR instead of INVALID_CHARACTER_ERR

Change component from JAXP to DOM.
This bug is invalid: according to the DOM Level 2 specification namespace err 
exception should be thrown if prefix is not NCName:
http://www.w3.org/TR/2000/REC-DOM-Level-2-Core-20001113/core.html#ID-
NodeNSPrefix
creator: elena@apache.org
